member.name: T:ManageUsers.PasswordPolicy
member.summary: A class containig methods to set the password policy for user passwords.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.PasswordPolicy.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for the class.
member.param: The connection string to connect to the SQLite database.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.PasswordPolicy.DefaultPolicyAsync
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 6 characters.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.PasswordPolicy.LevelOneAsync
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number and letter.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.PasswordPolicy.LevelTwoAsync
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number, at least one upper and lower case letter.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.PasswordPolicy.LevelThreeAsync
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number, one letter and one symbol.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.PasswordPolicy.LevelFourAsync
member.summary: Sets the password policy to minimum 8 characters, at least one number, one symbol, at least one upper and lower case letter.

member.name: T:ManageUsers.SetupTables
member.summary: A class used to setup the tables of your database.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.SetupTables.CreateTablesAsync(System.String)
member.summary: This method must be used to automatically create all the necessary tables for the database before any other method in the library can be used.
member.param: The connection string to connect to the SQLite database.

member.summary: Fetches all the existing usertypes from the database.
member.returns: All the usertypes in a list with usertype objects.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.UserManager.SerializeToFile(ManageUsers.Model.User,System.String)
member.summary: Serialize a user to csv, json or xml file.
member.param: The user object of the user to serlialize.
The file path of the file to write the serlialized object to. The file extension must be csv, json or xml.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.UserManager.SerializeToFile(System.Collections.Generic.List{ManageUsers.Model.User},System.String)
member.summary: Serialize a list of users to csv, json or xml file.
member.param: The list of user objects to serlialize.
The file path of the file to write the serlialized objects to. The file extension must be csv, json or xml.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.UserManager.DeSerializeFromFileAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Deserialize from csv, json or xml file and add the deserialized values to the database.
member.param: The file path of the file to read and deserlialized objects from. The file extension must be csv, json or xml.
member.exception: Thrown if the file doesn't exist

member.name: M:ManageUsers.UserManager.SerializeToXmlString(System.Object)
member.summary: Serialize one or a list of users to xml string.
member.returns: Xml string with the serialized object.
member.param: The user or list of users to serialize.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.UserManager.SerializeToJsonString(System.Object)
member.summary: Serialize one or a list of users to json string.
member.returns: Json string with the serialized object.
member.param: The user or list of users to serialize.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.UserManager.SerializeToCsvString(System.Object)
member.summary: Serialize one or a list of users to csv string.
member.returns: Csv string with the serialized object.
member.param: The user or list of users to serialize.

member.name: M:ManageUsers.UserManager.DeSerializeFromStringAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Deserialize from csv, json or xml formatted string and add the deserialized values to the database.
member.param: The string to deserlialized objects from. The string must be formatted as csv, json or xml.
